channel.title: Write buildpacks on Cloud Native Buildpacks
channel.description: Recent content in Write buildpacks on Cloud Native Buildpacks

item.title: Specify process types
item.description: One of the benefits of buildpacks is that they are multi-process - an image can have multiple entrypoints for each operational mode.

item.title: Provide a Software Bill-of-Materials
item.description: Buildpacks can provide a Software Bill-of-Materials (SBOM) to describe the dependencies that they provide.

item.title: Add labels to the application image
